name: Portuguese for Spanish Speakers
description: Introduction to the Portuguese language for speakers of Spanish. Development of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills with an emphasis on communication, and an overview of basic grammatical structures and building of vocabulary. Presentation of cultural aspects of the Portuguese-speaking world.
prerequisites: Native (or near-native) knowledge of Spanish (min. SPA320Y for non-native speakers of Spanish); no previous knowledge of Portuguese.
exclusions: PRT100Y1, PRT110Y1, PRT220Y1, PRT320Y1, PRT420Y1, PRT420H1, PRT219Y1

instructors: A Alves dos Santos Rato O Teixeira Barchi Severo
